title: [Flux eSports Club] - Looking for Video Editor/Graphic Designer (1 role)
body:
**Flux eSports Club** is a new competitive OOL team.
We are looking for a **Video Editor/Graphic Designer** (1 role) to be a part of our new team!

You will need to be proficient at:
- Photoshop (i.e. making thumbnails etc)
- editing videos in various styles ranging from simple edits to more complex cinematic ones

There is also an opportunity for the right person to become our Social Media Manager as well. 


If you think you are the right person for the role, 
please contact myself - **dubzy#7594** (Discord - _manager_) or **Ciphor** (ign - _owner_)

replies.body: Hi! Can you please msg Ciphor in-game please? Thanks!
